name: Chaos +
description:
What is the general idea of Chaos+?

Chaos+ is a dark fantasy rpg set in a world where the life of humans was brighter than ever before.As a mysterious force brings the world back to it's dark times,life is bound to be harsher,kill or be killed,sacrifice or be sacrificed.

Play as Marcus,a man is wandering from place to place in order to find meaning to his lowly life.

What are the features of Chaos+?
  • Resource scavenging, open every box and barrel, none to be left untouched.
  • Increasing your knowledge with books, resulting in crafting recipes.
  • Dark rooms ready to surprise you with their nasty tricks.
  • Randomization elements,for a different experience each and every time
  • Turn based combat,fight against enemies where victory is achieved by understanding them.
  • Custom pixel art graphics made by me,Toby Yasha.

Current Version: 0.1.0
